name: PAT_IDNT_VERF_HX
description: Stores information pertaining to a Patient Identifier verification query.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: Patient ID for the patient whose Patient Identifier is being verified

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_IDNT_MSG_S_TM
columns.description: Instant that verification query was sent

columns.name: PAT_IDNT_MSG_R_TM
columns.description: Instant that verification response was received

columns.name: PAT_IDNT_MSG_ID
columns.description: Record ID in General Use Notes (HNO) for items sent message (I HNO 16120) and received message (I HNO 16125).

columns.name: PAT_IDNT_RESP
columns.description: This item stores the query response for a Patient Identifier verification query
